justification: Fails to model Team B: a zero-RB, consensus-trusting manager valuing rookies is unlikely to trade Tier 1 rookie WR Cameron Scott at 6-2. Return (two volatile committee RBs) isn’t compelling for B. Rationale mislabels a TE “upgrade” for A despite A already having a Tier 1 TE and Turner being Tier 4. A would be thin at RB post-trade. Acceptance probability is overstated.
